title: 80x8: Applicability of Post-Government Employment Restrictions of 18 U.S.C. § 207(c) to Representations of Former Administrative Law Judge
summary:
Whether a former administrative law judge (ALJ) may represent claimants who seek benefits at hearings before ALJs of his former agency requires a case-by-case analysis.  

Notes: [cites former 5 C.F.R. part 737]
